sentences.en: A small house on the grounds of an a park, used a caretaker or gatekeeper.
sentences.cn: 建在通路上的一间屋子; 通常是看门人居住的地方.

sentences.en: He acted as a caretaker until a new president could be elected.
sentences.cn: 在推举出新总统之前,他担任临时代理总统.

sentences.en: He incurred the odium of everyone by sacking the old caretaker.
sentences.cn: 他因解雇老管理员而激起公愤.

sentences.en: Nick Wileman is a school caretaker so it is vital that he gets on well with young people.
sentences.cn: 尼克·威尔曼是学校的管理员，因此与年轻人搞好关系很重要。

sentences.en: Resumes are being accepted to work as an island caretaker in Australia's Great Barrier Reef.
sentences.cn: 现在澳大利亚就在打着这个旗号招聘大堡礁岛屿看护员呢.

sentences.en: Slater remained at the house, acting as its caretaker when the family was not in residence.
sentences.cn: 这家人不在的时候，斯莱特留在这幢房子里看家。

sentences.en: The caretaker closes up the school at 6 p.m.
sentences.cn: 下午六点钟看管人员关闭了校门.

sentences.en: The caretaker of the warehouse was trustworthy.
sentences.cn: 那个看管仓库的人是很可靠的.

sentences.en: The caretaker stokes up twice a day.
sentences.cn: 管理员每天往火里加两次煤.

sentences.en: The keys are in the possession of the caretaker.
sentences.cn: 那些钥匙由管理员持有.

sentences.en: The military intends to hand over power to a caretaker government and hold elections within six months.
sentences.cn: 军方打算将权力移交给临时政府，并在6个月内进行选举。

sentences.en: The old caretaker was always scolding and chiding.
sentences.cn: 这个老看门人总是责骂,呵叱个没完.

sentences.en: They put their chairs on their desks so that the caretaker could sweep the floor.
sentences.cn: 他们将椅子放在桌子上,以便管理员清扫地板.

sentences.en: This block of flats has a non - resident caretaker.
sentences.cn: 这座公寓的管理员不在公寓里住.

sentences.en: Today, I want to serve as a wetland caretaker.
sentences.cn: 今天我要当一回湿地管理员.

sentences.en: You don't own property or possessions. You are only a temporary caretaker.
sentences.cn: 你并未拥有资产或财产. 你只是个暂时的管理人.

trans.tran_en: A caretaker government or leader is in charge temporarily until a new government or leader is appointed
someone who looks after a house or land while the person who owns it is not there
